io.micronaut.build.aot

Class AotJarMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • io.micronaut.build.aot.AbstractMicronautAotMojo
        • io.micronaut.build.aot.AotJarMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="aot-jar",
      defaultPhase=PACKAGE,
      requiresDependencyResolution=COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME)
public class AotJarMojo
extends AbstractMicronautAotMojo
    Generates a jar optimized by Micronaut AOT, which is a jar corresponding to the regular application jar, except that it contains some optimizations computed at build time. It may contain, for example, additional classes, or even have different resources.
